column5: My place is close to My place is close to downtown area, Fort Worth Zoo, Will Rogers Coliseum, Amon Carter Museum and Colonial Golf Club. Rodeo at the legendary, Fort Worth Stockyards, or get in the fast lane at the Texas Motor Speedway.Take in a day at Sundance Square, WWII art at the sprawling Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth. Clean rooms, free breakfast, free WI-Fi.... My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
column8: Two queen beds hotel room w/Breakfast Scottish Inn
